name: Witch One?
description:
Witch One?  is a puzzle action game where you must figure out which item the witch wants in her potion, but she only speaks in abstract symbols!

Decipher which item the witch is asking for, and bring it to the cauldron and toss it in! If you bring the wrong item, the witch will tell you. Run out of Time and you lose!

  • [LEFT, RIGHT, UP, DOWN] - Move character
  • [SPACE] - Pick up item, Place item, Swap Items, Throw in Cauldron
  • [-/+] - Adjust Volume

Made for Scribble Jam 2021, in 4 Days  

  • Theme: Scribble / Doodle 
  • Challange: All text in your game must be a made up language

~Programming and Design 5evergames
~Art and Design by Sparkhur
